p: As the drugs similar to these ligands, several investigational adenosine A1 receptor agonists, namely tecadenoson, selodenoson, and trabodenoson, were found (Fig. 3A). These molecules share adenosine moiety, and this moiety interacts with the aforementioned 5 conserved residues in the complex models. The DSX scores of sinefungin, tecadenoson, selodenoson, and trabodenoson were −75.6, −54.3, −70.0, and −55.3, respectively. The scores of sinefungin and selodenoson were comparable to that (−74.9) of the genuine substrate, S‐adenosyl‐ l‐methionine, in the complex crystal structure with MERS‐CoV 2’‐ O‐ribose methyltransferase (PDB ID http://5YNI).
